item.title: Predictive Visual Tracking: A New Benchmark and Baseline Approach
ADTrack: Target-Aware Dual Filter Learning for Real-Time Anti-Dark UAV Tracking
item.description: <center> ![MKCT_workflow](featured.png) <small>Overall framework of the proposed ADTrack. ADTrack includes 3 stages: pretreatment, training, and detection, which are marked out by boxes in different colors. Dual filters, i.e., context filter and target-focused filter, training and detection follow routes in different colors. It can be seen that the final response shaded noises in context response, which indicates the validity of proposed dual filter.</small> </center>

item.title: All-Day Object Tracking for Unmanned Aerial Vehicle
